articles.author: Chris Gardner
articles.title: Andrea Arnold’s ‘Bird’ Takes Flight at Cannes Film Festival With 7-Minute Standing Ovation - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The new feature from the 'American Honey' director stars Barry Keoghan, Franz Rogowski, Nykiya Adams, and Jason Buda.
articles.content: Andrea Arnold‘s anticipated new film Bird touched down at the Cannes Film Festival on Thursday for an afternoon world premiere at the Grand Lumiere Theatre. And it got a warm reception, including a s… [+3152 chars]
